args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set Metric

variable {E : Type*} [NormedAddCommGroup E] [NormedSpace ‚Ñù E]

/-- If f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù is differentiable on s and the derivative is bounded on s (a compact set),
    then f is Lipschitz on s. -/
theorem differentiable_on.lipschitz_on_of_bounded_fderiv {f : E ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {s : Set E}
  (h_diff : DifferentiableOn ‚Ñù f s)
  (h_bound : ‚àÉ C : ‚Ñù, 0 ‚â§ C ‚àß ‚àÄ x ‚àà s, ‚Äñfderiv ‚Ñù f x‚Äñ ‚â§ C)
  (h_compact : IsCompact s) : ‚àÉ K : NNReal, LipschitzOnWith K f s := by

  sorry
